00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.

00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "strings.h"
00008 
00009 string getStatementQuestion(string line, int& actionStart) {
00010         // skip to open bracket
00011         int start = 0, end = 0;
00012         for(; start < line.length(); ++start) {
00013                 if(line[start] == '(') break;
00014         }
00015         ++start;
00016         
00017         // skip to close bracket
00018         int bracketCount = 0;
00019         for(end = start; end < line.length(); ++end) {
00020                 if(line[end] == '(')
00021                         ++bracketCount;
00022                 else if(line[end] == ')') {
00023                         if(!bracketCount) break;
00024                         --bracketCount;
00025                 }
00026         }
00027         
00028         actionStart = end + 1;
00029         return trim(line.substr(start, end - start));
00030 }
